body_html:
confirm the mklallocator problem during the compile is solved after #13731 merged
but meet another problem:

ERROR: /root/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:819:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/kernels:transpose_op' failed (Exit 1): gcc failed: error executing command
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_transpose_op.cc:53:10: error: template-id 'MKLTranspose2D' for 'tensorflow::Status tensorflow::MKLTranspose2D(char, const tensorflow::Tensor&, tensorflow::Tensor*)' does not match any template declaration
Status MKLTranspose2D(const char trans, const Tensor& in, Tensor* out) {
^
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_transpose_op.cc:60:3: note: in expansion of macro 'INSTANTIATE'
INSTANTIATE(float, s)
^
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_transpose_op.cc:122:1: error: expected '}' at end of input
} // namespace tensorflow
^
OS: redhat 7.4
bazel: 0.6.1
build command:
bazel build --config=mkl --copt="-g" --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" --copt="-mavx2" --copt="-mfma" --copt="-O3" --verbose_failures --copt="-L/opt/intel/gcc/lib64" -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Any ideas?

Any ideas?
body:
confirm the mklallocator problem during the compile is solved after #13731 merged
but meet another problem:

_ERROR: /root/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:819:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/kernels:transpose_op' failed (Exit 1): gcc failed: error executing command
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_transpose_op.cc:53:10: error: template-id 'MKLTranspose2D<float>' for 'tensorflow::Status tensorflow::MKLTranspose2D(char, const tensorflow::Tensor&, tensorflow::Tensor*)' does not match any template declaration
   Status MKLTranspose2D<T>(const char trans, const Tensor& in, Tensor* out) { \
          ^
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_transpose_op.cc:60:3: note: in expansion of macro 'INSTANTIATE'
   INSTANTIATE(float, s)
   ^
tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_transpose_op.cc:122:1: error: expected '}' at end of input
 }  // namespace tensorflow
 ^_
OS: redhat 7.4
bazel: 0.6.1
build command:
**bazel build --config=mkl --copt="-g" --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" --copt="-mavx2" --copt="-mfma" --copt="-O3" --verbose_failures --copt="-L/opt/intel/gcc/lib64" -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package**

Any ideas?
